html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-05472024-05-24PCH
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of MARC BEAUDET of Montréal, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, in the place of François R. Roy, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of MARC BEAUDET of Montréal, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, in the place of François R. Roy, whose term has expired.
